title: In a word, AWFUL!
review:
I usually love Stephen King book-inspired movies, but I sure was disappointed in this one!
I kept waiting for something to scare, terrorize or startle me, but it never happened! 
Maybe if I was 9 years old, it might have done something, but it sure didn't do it to/for me! 
To be fair, I'm going to watch it again in a couple of days, with a totally unbiased attitude; and if it scares or startled me, I'll let you know, but I sincerely doubt I'll change my mind! Too bad! 
It could have been a good movie! But....
